context_bundle.summary: THE ONE FILE MESSAGING SYSTEM. Path: C:\PhiDEX\msgqueue\. DO NOT CREATE DUPLICATES. DC inbox: dc\inbox. KALIC inbox: kalic\inbox. This is the canonical inter-agent file communication path.

onboarding.quick_start: ONE SYSTEM: C:\PhiDEX\msgqueue\. DC writes to kalic\inbox\, KALIC writes to dc\inbox\. Filename: from_<AGENT>_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.txt. After reading, move to processed\. Use $ bump for urgent notifications.
common_patterns: Processed msgs go to processed/ subfolder
known_errors: DO NOT CREATE DUPLICATE SYSTEMS - this is the ONE path
Check PhiSHRI before building new comms
KALIC context loss causes him to forget - always remind him of this path
